ProfileId.description: The canonical (synthetic) Xfuze contact profile id if identifiable e.g ContactProfile_D365_987654

ProfileKey.description: The native contact profile number of the contact profile master if identifiable e.g 987654

ProfileCode.description: The native contact profile code of the contact profile master if identifiable e.g 987654

ProfileType.description: The type of the contact profile

ProfilePurpose.description: The purpose of the usage of the contact profile

ProfileDesc.description: The description of the contact profile

ProfileName.description: The person name on the contact profile

PrimaryAddress.description: The address of the contact profile

PrimaryEmail.description: The email of the contact profile

PrimaryPhone.description: The phone of the contact profile

Lineage.description: The event lineage (e.g eventId, asOf) that lead to the observed/derived state of this object/data part
